projects.title: Workintech
projects.description: A simple, customizable, minimal setup cookie plugin that allows your users to select which cookies to accept or decline. This was created with vanilla JS, SCSS and Parcel Bundler and is available as a NPM package and the git repository makes any type of customization to code and themes possible.
